verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: is] hosting French President Emmanuel Macron and his wife Brigitte for a state dinner in Washington , D.C. , and there are no meatloaf sandwiches in sight .

[ARG0: Donald Trump] is [V: hosting] [ARG1: French President Emmanuel Macron and his wife Brigitte] [ARGM-PNC: for a state dinner in Washington , D.C.] , and there are no meatloaf sandwiches in sight .
Donald Trump is hosting French President Emmanuel Macron and his wife Brigitte for a state dinner in Washington , D.C. , and there [V: are] [ARG1: no meatloaf sandwiches] [ARGM-LOC: in sight] .
